description:
Prepare for exciting puzzle action in
Pokémon Shuffle, available to
download from Nintendo eShop on
Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In Pokémon
Shuffle, your goal is to clear various
stages by lining up the same Pokémon
and clearing these matches from the
puzzle area. Within each puzzle stage,
you can deal damage to the wild
Pokémon you face by lining up three
of the same Pokémon to clear them.
Battle and try to catch the Pokémon
before you run out of moves!
name: Pokémon™ Shuffle
